'use strict';module.exports=parse;var search=/[#.]/g;// Create a hast element from a simple CSS selector.
function parse(selector,defaultTagName){var value=selector||'';var name=defaultTagName||'div';var props={};var start=0;var subvalue;var previous;var match;while(start<value.length){search.lastIndex=start;match=search.exec(value);subvalue=value.slice(start,match?match.index:value.length);if(subvalue){if(!previous){name=subvalue;}else if(previous==='#'){props.id=subvalue;}else if(props.className){props.className.push(subvalue);}else{props.className=[subvalue];}start+=subvalue.length;}if(match){previous=match[0];start++;}}return{type:'element',tagName:name,properties:props,children:[]};}
